group.name: connection
group.description: Define the required connection configurations to initiate communication with the SaaS provider.

group.name: credentials
group.description: Define configurations needed for the username and password based authentication to the SaaS provider.

connection.name: sagcloud_oauth_2_web_server_authentication
connection.description: Connection using OAuth 2.0 Web Server Authentication Flow

group.name: web_server_authentication
group.description: Define the required connection configurations to initiate communication with the SaaS provider.

group.name: oauth_v20_authorization_code
group.description: Define configurations needed for the OAuth version 2.0 authentication scheme.

resource.name: insert
resource.description: Inserts a record in the specified table.

parameter.name: tableName
parameter.description: Specifies table for which record has to be inserted

parameter.name: sysparm_display_value
parameter.description: Return the display value (true), actual value (false), or both (all) for reference fields (default: false)

parameter.name: sysparm_exclude_reference_link
parameter.description: True to exclude Table API links for reference fields

parameter.name: sysparm_fields
parameter.description: A comma-separated list of fields to return in the response

parameter.name: sysparm_input_display_value
parameter.description: True to set raw value of input fields (default: false)

parameter.name: sysparm_view
parameter.description: Render the response according to the specified UI view (overridden by sysparm_fields)

resource.name: update
resource.description: Updates the specified record with the request body.

parameter.name: tableName
parameter.description: Specifies table for which record has to be Updated

parameter.name: sys_id
parameter.description: Unique UUID of record which has to be updated

parameter.name: sysparm_display_value
parameter.description: Return the display value (true), actual value (false), or both (all) for reference fields (default: false)

parameter.name: sysparm_fields
parameter.description: A comma-separated list of fields to return in the response

parameter.name: sysparm_input_display_value
parameter.description: True to set raw value of input fields (default: false)

parameter.name: sysparm_query_no_domain
parameter.description: True to include the record even if it is in a domain (default: false)

parameter.name: sysparm_view
parameter.description: Render the response according to the specified UI view (overridden by sysparm_fields)

resource.name: modify
resource.description: Updates the specified record with the request body.

parameter.name: tableName
parameter.description: Specifies table for which record has to be Modified

parameter.name: sys_id
parameter.description: Unique UUID of record which has to be Modified

parameter.name: sysparm_display_value
parameter.description: Return the display value (true), actual value (false), or both (all) for reference fields (default: false)

parameter.name: sysparm_exclude_reference_link
parameter.description: True to exclude Table API links for reference fields

parameter.name: sysparm_fields
parameter.description: A comma-separated list of fields to return in the response

parameter.name: sysparm_input_display_value
parameter.description: True to set raw value of input fields (default: false)

parameter.name: sysparm_query_no_domain
parameter.description: True to include the record even if it is in a domain (default: false)

parameter.name: sysparm_view
parameter.description: Render the response according to the specified UI view (overridden by sysparm_fields)

resource.name: delete
resource.description: Deletes the specified record from the specified table.

parameter.name: tableName
parameter.description: Specifies table from which record has to be deleted

parameter.name: sys_id
parameter.description: Unique UUID of record which has to be Deleted

parameter.name: sysparm_query_no_domain
parameter.description: True to include the record even if it is in a domain (default: false)

resource.name: get
resource.description: Retrieves the record identified by the specified sys_id from the specified table.

parameter.name: tableName
parameter.description: Specifies table from which record has to be retrieved

parameter.name: sys_id
parameter.description: Unique UUID of record which has to be Retrieved

parameter.name: sysparm_display_value
parameter.description: Return the display value (true), actual value (false), or both (all) for reference fields (default: false)

parameter.name: sysparm_exclude_reference_link
parameter.description: True to exclude Table API links for reference fields

parameter.name: sysparm_fields
parameter.description: A comma-separated list of fields to return in the response

parameter.name: sysparm_query_no_domain
parameter.description: True to include the record even if it is in a domain (default: false)

parameter.name: sysparm_view
parameter.description: Render the response according to the specified UI view (overridden by sysparm_fields)

resource.name: list
resource.description: Retrieves multiple records for the specified table with proper pagination information.

parameter.name: tableName
parameter.description: Specifies table from which records has to be retrieved

parameter.name: sysparm_query
parameter.description: An encoded query string used to filter the results

parameter.name: sysparm_display_value
parameter.description: Return the display value (true), actual value (false), or both (all) for reference fields (default: false)

parameter.name: sysparm_exclude_reference_link
parameter.description: True to exclude Table API links for reference fields

parameter.name: sysparm_fields
parameter.description: A comma-separated list of fields to return in the response

parameter.name: sysparm_limit
parameter.description: The maximum number of results returned per page (default: 10,000)

parameter.name: sysparm_view
parameter.description: Render the response according to the specified UI view (overridden by sysparm_fields)

parameter.name: sysparm_offset
parameter.description: Start index of the row

parameter.name: sysparm_query_no_domain
parameter.description: True to include the record even if it is in a domain (default: false)

parameter.name: sysparm_suppress_pagination_header
parameter.description: Flag that indicates whether to remove the Link header from the response. (default: false)

parameter.name: sysparm_query_category
parameter.description: Name of the category to use for queries.

resource.name: listExt
resource.description: Retrieves multiple records for the specified table with proper pagination information.

parameter.name: tableName
parameter.description: Specifies table from which records has to be retrieved

parameter.name: sysparm_query
parameter.description: An encoded query string used to filter the results

parameter.name: sysparm_display_value
parameter.description: Return the display value (true), actual value (false), or both (all) for reference fields (default: false)

parameter.name: sysparm_exclude_reference_link
parameter.description: True to exclude Table API links for reference fields

parameter.name: sysparm_fields
parameter.description: A comma-separated list of fields to return in the response

parameter.name: sysparm_limit
parameter.description: The maximum number of results returned per page (default: 10,000)

parameter.name: sysparm_view
parameter.description: Render the response according to the specified UI view (overridden by sysparm_fields)

parameter.name: sysparm_offset
parameter.description: Start index of the row

parameter.name: sysparm_query_no_domain
parameter.description: True to include the record even if it is in a domain (default: false)

parameter.name: sysparm_suppress_pagination_header
parameter.description: Flag that indicates whether to remove the Link header from the response. (default: false)

parameter.name: sysparm_query_category
parameter.description: Name of the category to use for queries.

resource.name: getFields
resource.description: Lists all the fields of the table

parameter.name: sysparm_query
parameter.description: An encoded query string used to filter the results

parameter.name: sysparm_fields
parameter.description: A comma-separated list of fields to return in the response

resource.name: listBusinessObject
resource.description: Lists all available Tables

parameter.name: sysparm_query
parameter.description: An encoded query string used to filter the results

parameter.name: sysparm_fields
parameter.description: A comma-separated list of fields to return in the response

parameter.name: super_class.name
parameter.description: TableName of class for which implementation table will be retrieved

resource.name: getSchema
resource.description: Lists Schema of Table

parameter.name: tableName
parameter.description: Specifies table for which schema will be retrieved

resource.name: getParent
resource.description: Lists Schema of Table

parameter.name: sys_id
parameter.description: Unique UUID of table

resource.name: createEmail
resource.description: Creates the email record specified in the request body.

resource.name: getEmail
resource.description: Returns the record details of the specified email record.

parameter.name: sys_id
parameter.description: sys_id of the email

parameter.name: sysparm_fields
parameter.description: A comma-separated list of fields to return in the response

resource.name: retrieveStatisticalCalculation
resource.description: Retrieves records for the specified table and performs aggregate functions on the returned values.

parameter.name: tableName
parameter.description: Table name in which Statistical calculation has to be performed

parameter.name: sysparm_avg_fields
parameter.description: A comma-separated list of fields for which to calculate the average value

parameter.name: sysparm_min_fields
parameter.description: A comma-separated list of fields for which to calculate the minimum value

parameter.name: sysparm_max_fields
parameter.description: A comma-separated list of fields for which to calculate the maximum value

parameter.name: sysparm_sum_fields
parameter.description: A comma-separated list of fields for which to calculate the sum of the values

parameter.name: sysparm_count
parameter.description: Calculate the number of records (default: false)

parameter.name: sysparm_order_by
parameter.description: A comma-separated list of fields to order results by

parameter.name: sysparm_having
parameter.description: An additional query allowing you to filter the data based on an aggregate operation

resource.name: retrieveStatisticalCalculationWithGroupByField
resource.displayName: Retrieve Statistical Calculation for table With GroupBy Field
resource.description: Retrieves records for the specified table and performs aggregate functions on the returned values.

parameter.name: tableName
parameter.description: Table name in which Statistical calculation has to be performed

parameter.name: sysparm_avg_fields
parameter.description: A comma-separated list of fields for which to calculate the average value

parameter.name: sysparm_min_fields
parameter.description: A comma-separated list of fields for which to calculate the minimum value

parameter.name: sysparm_max_fields
parameter.description: A comma-separated list of fields for which to calculate the maximum value

parameter.name: sysparm_sum_fields
parameter.description: A comma-separated list of fields for which to calculate the sum of the values

parameter.name: sysparm_count
parameter.description: Calculate the number of records (default: false)

parameter.name: sysparm_order_by
parameter.description: A comma-separated list of fields to order results by

parameter.name: sysparm_group_by
parameter.description: A comma-separated list of fields to group results by

parameter.name: sysparm_having
parameter.description: An additional query allowing you to filter the data based on an aggregate operation

parameter.name: sysparm_display_value
parameter.description: Return the display value (true), actual value (false), or both (all) in grouped results (default: false)

resource.name: list
resource.description: Returns metadata of multiple attachments.

parameter.name: sysparm_query
parameter.description: An encoded query string used to filter the results (relative to Attachment table)

parameter.name: sysparm_suppress_pagination_header
parameter.description: True to supress pagination header (default: false)

parameter.name: sysparm_limit
parameter.description: The maximum number of results returned per page (default: 10,000)

parameter.name: sysparm_offset
parameter.description: Start index of the row

resource.name: listExt
resource.description: Returns metadata of multiple attachments.

parameter.name: sysparm_query
parameter.description: An encoded query string used to filter the results (relative to Attachment table)

parameter.name: sysparm_suppress_pagination_header
parameter.description: True to supress pagination header (default: false)

parameter.name: sysparm_limit
parameter.description: The maximum number of results returned per page (default: 10,000)

parameter.name: sysparm_offset
parameter.description: Start index of the row

resource.name: get
resource.description: Retrieve metadata for the attachment file with a specific sys_id value.

parameter.name: sys_id
parameter.description: Unique UUID of attachment which has to be Retrieved

resource.name: delete
resource.description: Deletes the attachment with a specific sys_id value.

parameter.name: sys_id
parameter.description: Unique UUID of attachment which has to be Deleted

resource.name: upload
resource.description: Uploads a binary file specified in the request body as an attachment.

parameter.name: table_name
parameter.description: Table to attach the file to

parameter.name: table_sys_id
parameter.description: Record to attach the file to

parameter.name: file_name
parameter.description: File name for the attachment

parameter.name: encryption_context
parameter.description: Encryption context to be used if file to be saved encrypted

resource.name: retrieveAttachmentContent
resource.description: Gets the binary file attachment with a specific sys_id value.

parameter.name: sys_id
parameter.description: Unique UUID of attachment whose content has to be Retrieved

resource.name: uploadsMultipartFile
resource.description: Uploads a multipart file.

resource.name: insert
resource.description: Inserts data into specified staging table and triggers transformation based on predefined transform maps in the import set table.

parameter.name: stagingTableName
parameter.description: Specifies table for which record has to be inserted

resource.name: get
resource.description: Retrieves the specified import staging record and resulting transformation result.

parameter.name: stagingTableName
parameter.description: Specifies table from which record has to be retrieved

parameter.name: sys_id
parameter.description: Unique UUID of record which has to be Retrieved

service.name: Account
service.description: The Account REST API enables you to retrieve and update Customer Service Management (CSM) account records.

resource.name: listAccount
resource.description: Retrieves a specified set of Customer Service Management (CSM) accounts.

resource.name: getAccount
resource.description: Retrieves the specified Customer Service Management (CSM) account.

resource.name: defaultCartContents
resource.description: Retrieves the default list of cart contents, cart details, and price shown on the two-step checkout page.

resource.name: getShippingAddress
resource.description: Retrieves the shipping address of the requested user.

parameter.name: user_id
parameter.description: Indicates sys_id of the user, whose shipping address is retrieved.

resource.name: listCatalogs
resource.description: This method retrieves a list of catalogs to which the user has access to.

parameter.name: sysparm_limit
parameter.description: Specify the number of entities in the response. This value applies to categories and items.

parameter.name: sysparm_text
parameter.description: Specify query text for search support

parameter.name: sysparm_view
parameter.description: Specify the device to display the item (desktop, mobile, or both)

resource.name: listCatalogsExt
resource.description: This method retrieves a list of catalogs to which the user has access to.

parameter.name: sysparm_limit
parameter.description: Specify the number of entities in the response. This value applies to categories and items.

parameter.name: sysparm_text
parameter.description: Specify query text for search support

parameter.name: sysparm_view
parameter.description: Specify the device to display the item (desktop, mobile, or both)

resource.name: getCatalog
resource.description: Retrives details of a catalog

parameter.name: sys_id
parameter.description: Specify the sys_id of the catalog.

parameter.name: sysparm_view
parameter.description: Specify the device to display the item (desktop, mobile, or both)

resource.name: listCatalogCategories
resource.description: Retrive list of categories for a specific catalog

parameter.name: sys_id
parameter.description: Specify the sys_id of the catalog.

parameter.name: sysparam_top_level_only
parameter.description: Gets only those categories whose parent is a catalog.

parameter.name: sysparam_limit
parameter.description: Number of categories in the result

parameter.name: sysparam_view
parameter.description: Specify the device to display the item (desktop, mobile, or both)

parameter.name: sysparam_offset
parameter.description: Offset to set the query window.

resource.name: getCategory
resource.description: Retrives details of a category

parameter.name: sys_id
parameter.description: Specify the sys_id of the category

parameter.name: sysparam_view
parameter.description: Specify the device to display the item (desktop, mobile, or both)

resource.name: listOfCatalogItems
resource.description: Get list of catalog items

parameter.name: sysparm_category
parameter.description: Specify the category sys_id of the item.

parameter.name: sysparm_type
parameter.description: Specify the type of item. For example, Record Producer, Order Guide. This field is used by the item-search to search specified item types.

parameter.name: sysparm_limit
parameter.description: Specify the number of entities in the response. This value applies to categories and items.

parameter.name: sysparm_text
parameter.description: Specify query text for search support. (Required)

parameter.name: sysparm_offset
parameter.description: Specify the offset used for pagination.

parameter.name: sysparm_catalog
parameter.description: Specify the catalog sys_id of the item.

parameter.name: sysparam_view
parameter.description: Specify the device to display the item (desktop, mobile, or both)

resource.name: listOfCatalogItemsExt
resource.description: Get list of catalog items

parameter.name: sysparm_category
parameter.description: Specify the category sys_id of the item.

parameter.name: sysparm_type
parameter.description: Specify the type of item. For example, Record Producer, Order Guide. This field is used by the item-search to search specified item types.

parameter.name: sysparm_limit
parameter.description: Specify the number of entities in the response. This value applies to categories and items.

parameter.name: sysparm_text
parameter.description: Specify query text for search support. (Required)

parameter.name: sysparm_offset
parameter.description: Specify the offset used for pagination.

parameter.name: sysparm_catalog
parameter.description: Specify the catalog sys_id of the item.

parameter.name: sysparam_view
parameter.description: Specify the device to display the item (desktop, mobile, or both)

resource.name: getCatalogItem
resource.description: Retrieves details of a specific catalog item

parameter.name: sys_id
parameter.description: Specify the sys_id of the item.

parameter.name: sysparam_view
parameter.description: Specify the device to display the item (desktop, mobile, or both)

resource.name: updateCartItem
resource.description: This method edits and updates any item in the cart.

parameter.name: cart_item_id
parameter.description: Represents the sys_id of the item in the cart.

resource.name: checkoutCart
resource.description: Checks out the cart and returns the request number and request order ID.

resource.name: submitOrder
resource.description: Checks out the user cart, whether two-step parameter is enabled or disabled.

resource.name: deleteItemsFromCart
resource.description: Deletes the items in the cart for a given sys_id.

parameter.name: cart_item_id
parameter.description: Represents the sys_id of the item in the cart.

resource.name: emptyCart
resource.description: Deletes the cart and contents of the cart for a given user role and sys_id.

parameter.name: sys_id
parameter.description: Indicates the sys_id of the cart to empty.

resource.name: describeNeedsOfAnOrderGuide
resource.displayName: Describe Needs of an Order Guide
resource.description: Retrieves a list of items based on the needs described for an order guide.

parameter.name: sys_id
parameter.description: Specify the category sys_id of the item.

resource.name: addItemToCart
resource.description: Adds an item to the cart of the current user.

parameter.name: sys_id
parameter.description: Specify the category sys_id of the item.

resource.name: submitRecordProducer
resource.description: Creates a record and returns the Table API relative path and redirect url to access the created record.

parameter.name: sys_id
parameter.description: Specify the category sys_id of the item.

parameter.name: sysparm_view
parameter.description: Specify the device to display the item (desktop, mobile, or both)

resource.name: addItemToWishlist
resource.description: Adds the specified item to the wish list cart..

parameter.name: sys_id
parameter.description: Specify the category sys_id of the item.

resource.name: getWishlistItem
resource.description: Retrieves the details of the specified item stored in the wish list cart

parameter.name: cart_item_id
parameter.description: Specify the cart_item_id of the item.

resource.name: listWishlistItems
resource.description: Retrieves a list of items from the logged in user's wish list.

resource.name: listWishlistItemsExt
resource.description: Retrieves a list of items from the logged in user's wish list.

resource.name: variableDisplayValue
resource.description: Returns the display value of the specified variable.

parameter.name: sys_id
parameter.description: Specify the category sys_id of the item.

resource.name: buyItem
resource.description: Orders the specified catalog item.

parameter.name: sys_id
parameter.description: Specify the category sys_id of the item.

resource.name: checkoutOrderGuide
resource.description: Retrieves an array of contents requested for checkout.

parameter.name: sys_id
parameter.description: Specify the category sys_id of the item.

resource.name: invalidDelegatedUsers
resource.description: Returns a list of users whose request for the specified item cannot be delegated (requested by another user.)

parameter.name: item_sys_id
parameter.description: Specify the sys_id of the service catalog item to verify whether the specified user has acquisition rights

resource.name: acquisitionRightsToCatalogItem
resource.displayName: Verifies whether user has acquisition rights to catalog item
resource.description: Verifies whether the specified delegated user has acquisition rights to the specified service catalog item

parameter.name: item_sys_id
parameter.description: Specify the sys_id of the service catalog item to verify whether the specified user has acquisition rights

parameter.name: user_id
parameter.description: Specify the sys_id of the user to check whether they have acquisition rights to the specified service catalog item

service.name: AwaAgent
service.description: The AWA Agent API enables you to to get or set agent presence and channel availability.

resource.name: getAgentPresenceStateAndChannelAvailability
resource.displayName: Get agent presence state and channel availability
resource.description: Returns the current agent presence state and channel availability.

parameter.name: user_id
parameter.description: Specify the sys_id of the agent

resource.name: setAgentPresenceStateAndChannelAvailability
resource.displayName: Set agent presence state and channel availability
resource.description: Sets the state of a specified agents presence and, if provided, sets the agents channel availability for that state.

parameter.name: user_id
parameter.description: Specify the sys_id of the agent

service.name: ActivitySubscriptions
service.description: Use the ActivitySubscriptions API to retrieve Activity entities from the Subscriptions and Activity Feed Framework.

resource.name: retrievesActivityRecordsFromtheSubscriptionsandActivityFeedFramework
resource.description: Retrieves activity records from the Subscriptions and Activity Feed Framework.

resource.name: retrieveFacetsForAnActivityContext
resource.displayName: Retrieve facets for an activity context
resource.description: Retrieves facets configured for an activity context from the Subscriptions and Activity Feed Framework. Displays activity counts and data for each facet as determined by activity type, group, and context settings.

service.name: AwaRouting
service.description: Use the AWA (Advanced Work Assignment) API to route a document to a queue.

resource.name: routesADocumentToAQueueOrCreatesWorkItem
resource.displayName: Routes Document To A Queue Or Creates Work Item
resource.description: If an active work item exists, routes a document to a queue. If an active work item does not exist for the specified document, creates a work item and set its fields accordingly.

parameter.name: queue_sys_id
parameter.description: Specify the sys_id of the queue record from the Queue [awa_queue] table

resource.name: getGetcustomerinformationandconfigurationdetails
resource.displayName: Get customer information and configuration details
resource.description: Returns customer information and configuration details for a specific customer context

resource.name: userRoleInheritance
resource.description: Returns the queried user's roles and determines which roles are inherited.

service.name: ApplicationService
service.description: Create, modify, and update application services using REST APIs.

resource.name: getGetcontent
resource.description: Retrieves a list of configuration items (CI) in an application service and the relationships between them. Only retrieves content for services that were manually created.

resource.name: getReturnsbasicinformationaboutaspecifiedapplicationserviceanditsassociatedbusinesscontext.
resource.description: Returns basic information about a specified application service and its associated business context. You should provide as query parameter name or number of the service for which to return information. If number is not passed in, name shoud be provided.

resource.name: postRegisteranapplicationservice
resource.description: Creates an application service record stub in the Application Service [cmdb_ci_service_auto] table and populates it with the passed in information. Before storing the record, it validates the passed parameters and the uniqueness of the application service name.

resource.name: CreateAnApplicationService
resource.displayName: Create or update an application service
resource.description: Creates an application service or update an existing application service.

resource.name: PopulateAnApplicationService
resource.description: Populates the specified application service with a specified set of downstream configuration items (CI). Before calling this endpoint, you must call the POST /now/cmdb/csdm/app_service/register_service endpoint to create the application service.

resource.name: UpdateAnApplicationService
resource.description: Updates the specified application service with the passed in basic information. It also validates the uniqueness of the application service by checking the passed in information against the Identification and Reconciliation engine (IRE) rules defined on the application service class.

resource.name: sendMultipleRequests
resource.description: Sends multiple REST API requests in a single call.

resource.name: list
resource.description: Retrieves list of Scorecards.

parameter.name: sysparm_uuid
parameter.description: The scope of the scorecard or list of breakdown scorecards, or a comma-separated list of scopes

parameter.name: sysparm_breakdown
parameter.description: sys_id of the breakdown for a list of breakdown scorecards

parameter.name: sysparm_breakdown_relation
parameter.description: sys_id of the breakdown relation for a list of related breakdown scorecards

parameter.name: sysparm_elements_filter
parameter.description: sys_id of the elements filter to be applied to the list of breakdown scorecards

parameter.name: sysparm_display
parameter.description: True/False to return scorecards whose indicators have 'Publish on Scorecards' checked resp. unchecked, 'all' to ignore the value of 'Publish on Scorecards', default to true

parameter.name: sysparm_favorites
parameter.description: True to return only scorecards that are the user's favorite

parameter.name: sysparm_key
parameter.description: True to return only scorecards of Key indicators

parameter.name: sysparm_target
parameter.description: True to return only scorecards that have a target

parameter.name: sysparm_contains
parameter.description: Matches scorecards by name or description, use comma separated list of strings

parameter.name: sysparm_tags
parameter.description: Matches scorecards by tag sysids, use comma separated list of sysids

parameter.name: sysparm_per_page
parameter.description: pages by this amount, defaults to 10, maximum is 100

parameter.name: sysparm_page
parameter.description: page of list of scorecards, defaults to 1

parameter.name: sysparm_sortdir
parameter.description: Use value ASC to sort in ascending order, use DESC to sort in descending order

parameter.name: sysparm_display_value
parameter.description: True/false to return display value or reference field, or 'all' to return both, defaults to all

parameter.name: sysparm_exclude_reference_link
parameter.description: True to not return Link Information for Reference Fields

parameter.name: sysparm_include_scores
parameter.description: True to include scores for each scorecard, requires the presence of sysparm_uuid

parameter.name: sysparm_from
parameter.description: Start date in ISO-8601 format for which to return scores

parameter.name: sysparm_to
parameter.description: End date in ISO-8601 format for which to return scores

parameter.name: sysparm_step
parameter.description: Positive integer indicating the gap between score dates, default to 1

parameter.name: sysparm_limit
parameter.description: Maximum number of scores to return, -1 means to return all scores, default to -1

parameter.name: sysparm_include_available_breakdowns
parameter.description: True to include all available breakdowns for a scorecard

parameter.name: sysparm_include_available_aggregates
parameter.description: True to include all available aggregates for a scorecard

parameter.name: sysparm_include_score_notes
parameter.description: True to include all available score notes

parameter.name: sysparm_sortby
parameter.description: Field to sort by

parameter.name: sysparm_offset
parameter.description: Start index of the row

resource.name: getActivityStreamForCase
resource.displayName: Get Activity Stream For A CSM Case
resource.description: Retrieves the activity stream for a specified Customer Service Management (CSM) case.

parameter.name: id
parameter.description: Specifies the sys_id or case number of the case to retrieve

parameter.name: sysparm_limit
parameter.description: Maximum number of records to return

parameter.name: sysparm_offset
parameter.description: Starting record index for which to begin retrieving records. Use this value to paginate record retrieval.

resource.name: getListOfFieldValues
resource.description: Retrieves the list of possible field values for a choice or reference field in the Case [sn_customerservice_case] table.

parameter.name: field_name
parameter.description: Name of a choice or reference field in the Case [sn_customerservice_case] table.

parameter.name: sysparm_dependent_value
parameter.description: Value to select in the Case [sn_customerservice_case] table choice field that the requested field is dependent on. Use only when requesting a choice field that is dependent on another field

parameter.name: sysparm_limit
parameter.description: Maximum number of records to return

parameter.name: sysparm_offset
parameter.description: Starting record index for which to begin retrieving records. Use this value to paginate record retrieval.

parameter.name: sysparm_query
parameter.description: An encoded query string used to filter the results

parameter.name: sysparm_ref_qual_input
parameter.description: Encoded set of field values representing a current object to pass to reference qualifiers that use JavaScript functions. Use only when requesting a reference field.

resource.name: getListOfFieldValuesForARecord
resource.displayName: Get List Of Field Values For A Record
resource.description: Retrieves the list of possible field values for a choice or reference field for a specified record in the Case [sn_customerservice_case] table.

parameter.name: field_name
parameter.description: Name of a choice or reference field in the Case [sn_customerservice_case] table.

parameter.name: id
parameter.description: Specifies the sys_id of the record. Located in the Case [sn_customerservice_case] table to use when evaluating reference qualifiers.

parameter.name: sysparm_dependent_value
parameter.description: Value to select in the Case [sn_customerservice_case] table choice field that the requested field is dependent on. Use only when requesting a choice field that is dependent on another field

parameter.name: sysparm_limit
parameter.description: Maximum number of records to return

parameter.name: sysparm_offset
parameter.description: Starting record index for which to begin retrieving records. Use this value to paginate record retrieval.

parameter.name: sysparm_query
parameter.description: An encoded query string used to filter the results

parameter.name: sysparm_ref_qual_input
parameter.description: Encoded set of field values representing a current object to pass to reference qualifiers that use JavaScript functions. Use only when requesting a reference field.

resource.name: getCase
resource.description: Retrieves the specified Customer Service Management (CSM) case.

parameter.name: id
parameter.description: Specifies the sys_id or case number for the case to retrieve. Located in the Case [sn_customerservice_case] table.

parameter.name: sysparm_display_value
parameter.description: Data retrieval operation for reference and choice fields.

resource.name: listCase
resource.description: Retrieves a specified set of Customer Service Management (CSM) cases.

parameter.name: sysparm_display_value
parameter.description: Data retrieval operation for reference and choice fields.

parameter.name: sysparm_limit
parameter.description: Maximum number of records to return

parameter.name: sysparm_offset
parameter.description: Starting record index for which to begin retrieving records. Use this value to paginate record retrieval.

parameter.name: sysparm_query
parameter.description: An encoded query string used to filter the results

parameter.name: sysparm_reference_fields
parameter.description: Whether or not to retrieve fields from reference tables such as account, contact, consumer, and sn_app_cs_social_social_profile.

resource.name: createCase
resource.description: Creates a new Customer Service Management (CSM) case.

resource.name: updateCase
resource.description: Updates the specified existing Customer Service Management (CSM) case with the passed-in parameters.

parameter.name: id
parameter.description: Sys_id of the case to update. Located in the Case [sn_customerservice_case] table.

resource.name: postInsertorUpdaterecordininteractiontable
resource.displayName: Insert or Update record in interaction table
resource.description: Insert or Update record in interaction table.

resource.name: postChangeinteractionstate
resource.description: Changes the state of an interaction to closed or closed complete.

resource.name: setStateForCis
resource.description: Sets the operational state for a specified list of configuration items (CIs).

parameter.name: oldOpsLabels
parameter.description: Comma-separated list of old CI operational states in which all CIs should be included.

parameter.name: opsLabel
parameter.description: Label of the operational state to set for the specified CIs.

parameter.name: requestorId
parameter.description: Sys_id of a workflow context, or an operator user ID returned from the CI Lifecycle Management - POST /now/cilifecyclemgmt/operators endpoint.

parameter.name: sysIds
parameter.description: Comma-separated list of sys_ids of CIs for which the operational state is to be set.

resource.name: registerOperator
resource.description: Registers an operator for a non-workflow user.

resource.name: addCiActionToList
resource.description: Adds a specified configuration item (CI) action to a specified list of CIs.

parameter.name: actionName
parameter.description: Name of the CI action to add to the list.

parameter.name: leaseTime
parameter.description: Time duration for which the lease is valid for specified CI action.

parameter.name: oldActionNames
parameter.description: Comma-separated list of old CI actions that all CIs should be in.

parameter.name: requestorId
parameter.description: Sys_id of a workflow context, or an operator user ID returned from the CI Lifecycle Management - POST /now/cilifecyclemgmt/operators endpoint.

parameter.name: sysIds
parameter.description: Comma-separated list of CI sys_ids to which to add the CI action.

resource.name: getOperationalStateForCi
resource.description: Returns the current operational state for the specified configuration item (CI).

parameter.name: sys_id
parameter.description: Sys_id of the CI.

resource.name: validRequestor
resource.displayName: Determine Whether User Is A Valid Requestor
resource.description: Determines whether the specified active workflow user or registered user is a valid requestor.

parameter.name: req_id
parameter.description: Sys_id of a workflow context, or an operator user ID returned from the CI Lifecycle Management - POST /now/cilifecyclemgmt/operators endpoint.

resource.name: allowedOpsTransition
resource.description: Determines whether a configuration item (CI) from a specified class can transition from a specified operational state to a second specified operational state.

parameter.name: ciClass
parameter.description: CI class to check transition restrictions for.

parameter.name: opsLabel
parameter.description: Label of current CI operational state.

parameter.name: transitionOpsLabel
parameter.description: Label of operational state that is the target of the transition.

resource.name: notAllowedAction
resource.displayName: Determine Whether CI Action Is Not Allowed
resource.description: Determines whether a specified configuration item (CI) action is not allowed for a CI of a specified class when in a specified operational state.

parameter.name: ciClass
parameter.description: CI class to check action restrictions for.

parameter.name: opsLabel
parameter.description: Operational state to check.

parameter.name: actionName
parameter.description: Name of the CI action to check.

resource.name: leaseHasExpired
resource.displayName: Determine Whether The Lease Has Expired
resource.description: Determines whether the lease has expired for the requestor of a configuration item (CI) action applied to the specified CI.

parameter.name: sys_id
parameter.description: Sys_id of the CI that is the target of the applied CI action.

parameter.name: requestorId
parameter.description: Sys_id of a workflow context, or an operator user ID returned from the CI Lifecycle Management - POST /now/cilifecyclemgmt/operators endpoint.

parameter.name: actionName
parameter.description: Name of the CI action applied to the specified CI.

resource.name: extendCiActionsLeaseExpirationTime
resource.displayName: Extend CI Action's Lease Expiration Time
resource.description: Extends the specified configuration item (CI) action's lease expiration time for the specified user.

parameter.name: sys_id
parameter.description: Sys_id of the CI for which to extend the lease.

parameter.name: requestorId
parameter.description: Sys_id of a workflow context, or an operator user ID returned from the CI Lifecycle Management - POST /now/cilifecyclemgmt/operators endpoint.

parameter.name: actionName
parameter.description: Name of the associated CI action.

parameter.name: leaseTime
parameter.description: Time duration for which the lease is valid for the CI action specified in actionName.

resource.name: actionsAreCompatible
resource.displayName: Determine Whether CI Actions Are Compatible
resource.description: Determines whether two specified configuration item (CI) actions are compatible.

parameter.name: actionName
parameter.description: Name of CI action to compare.

parameter.name: otherActionName
parameter.description: Name of CI action to compare.

resource.name: listActiveActionsForCi
resource.description: Returns a list of active configuration item (CI) actions for the specified CI.

parameter.name: sys_id
parameter.description: Sys_id of the CI for which to return associated CI actions.

resource.name: unregisterOperator
resource.description: Unregisters an operator for non-workflow users.

parameter.name: req_id
parameter.description: Sys_id of a workflow context, or an operator user ID returned from the CI Lifecycle Management - POST /now/cilifecyclemgmt/operators endpoint.

resource.name: removeCiActionForAListOfCis
resource.displayName: Remove CI Action For A List Of CIs
resource.description: Removes a configuration item (CI) action for a list of CIs.

parameter.name: actionName
parameter.description: Configuration item action name.

parameter.name: requestorId
parameter.description: Sys_id of a workflow context, or an operator user ID returned from the CI Lifecycle Management - POST /now/cilifecyclemgmt/operators endpoint.

parameter.name: sysIds
parameter.description: Comma-separated list of CI sys_ids.

service.name: ChangeManagement
service.description: The Change Management API provides REST APIs that enable third-party application integration with the ServiceNow Change Management process. Use these REST APIs to integrate your change management process with external applications and when developing ServiceNow client-side applications. Also use these REST APIs as a reference model and guide to the scriptable APIs.

resource.name: DeleteChangeRequestTask
resource.description: Deletes the change request task identified by the specified sys_ids.

resource.name: GetTasksAssociatedWithASpecifiedChangeRequest
resource.description: Retrieves one or more tasks associated with a specified change request based on the specified criteria.

resource.name: GetCIsAssociatedToAApecifiedChangeRequests
resource.description: Retrieves multiple configuration items (CIs) associated to a specified change request based on the specified association type.

resource.name: GetStatusOfTheConflictCheckingProcess
resource.displayName: Get status of the conflict checking process
resource.description: Retrieves the status of the currently running change request conflict checking process or the results of the last completed conflict checking process for the specified change request.

resource.name: GetEmergencyChangeRequests
resource.description: Retrieves one or more emergency change requests based on the specified criteria.

resource.name: CreateTheAssociationBetweenAChangeRequestAndCMDBCI
resource.displayName: Create the association between a change request and CMDB CI
resource.description: Creates the association between a change request and Configuration Management Database (CMDB) configuration items (CI). The creation of the association is done asynchronously, which means that a response is provided immediately and contains details for the worker. The worker does the actual work after the response.

resource.name: CreateAChangeRequestCheckingProcess
resource.displayName: Create a change request checking process
resource.description: Starts a change request conflict checking process for the specified change request (sys_id).

resource.name: CreateAnEmergencyChangeRequest
resource.description: Creates one emergency change request based on the default emergency change request record. Multiple emergency change request creations within a single call is not supported.

resource.name: CreateaNormalChangeRequest
resource.description: Creates one normal change request based on the default normal change request record. Multiple normal change request creations within a single call is not supported.

resource.name: CreateAStandardChangeRequestBasedOnATemplate
resource.displayName: Create a standard change request based on a template
resource.description: Creates one standard change request based on an existing standard change template as specified by the passed-in template sys_id. Multiple standard change request creations within a single call is not supported.

resource.name: PopulatesTheImpactedServices
resource.description: Populates the impacted services/configuration related list based on the primary CI. The primary CI appears on the change request form and affected CI related list.

resource.name: CreateaChangeRequestTask
resource.description: Creates one change request task based on the default change request task record and associates it with the specified change request. Multiple change request task creations within a single call is not supported.

resource.name: GetTheEmergencyChangeRequest
resource.description: Retrieves the emergency change request identified by the specified sys_id.

resource.name: GetNormalChangeRequests
resource.description: Retrieves one or more normal change requests based on the specified criteria.

resource.name: GetTheNormalChangeRequest
resource.description: Retrieves the normal change request identified by the specified sys_id.

resource.name: GetStandardChangeRequests
resource.description: Retrieves one or more standard change requests based on the specified criteria.

resource.name: GetTheStandardChangeRequest
resource.description: Retrieves the standard change request identified by the specified sys_id.

resource.name: GetStandardChangeTemplates
resource.description: Retrieves one or more standard change templates based on the specified criteria.

resource.name: GetTheStandardChangeTemplate
resource.description: Retrieves the standard change template identified by the specified sys_id.

resource.name: GetInformationAboutTheSpecifiedAsynchronousWorker
resource.displayName: Get information about the specified asynchronous worker
resource.description: Retrieves the current status, information, and errors for the specified asynchronous worker.

resource.name: ApproveOrRejectAChangeRequest
resource.displayName: Approve or reject a change request
resource.description: Allows the current user to approve or reject a change request approval record for the specified change request (sys_id).

resource.name: CalculateTheRiskOfTheStandardChange
resource.displayName: Calculate the risk of a standard change
resource.description: Calculates the risk and impact of the specified standard change based on an evaluation of the risk conditions. If the Change Risk Assessment plugin is installed, it also calculates the cumulative highest risk once the risk assessment is complete.

resource.name: UpdateTheChangeRequestTask
resource.description: Updates the change request task identified by the specified sys_ids with the key-value pairs in the request body.

resource.name: UpdateStandardChangeRequest
resource.description: Updates the standard change request identified by the specified sys_id with the parameters in the request body.

resource.name: UpdateNormalChangeRequest
resource.description: Updates the normal change request identified by the specified sys_id with the parameters in the request body.

resource.name: UpdateEmergencyChangeRequest
resource.description: Updates the emergency change request identified by the specified sys_id with the key-value pairs in the request body.

resource.name: CancelRunningConflictCheckingProcess
resource.displayName: Cancel the running conflict checking process
resource.description: Cancels the running conflict checking process for the specified change request (sys_id).

resource.name: DeleteTheEmergencyChangeRequest
resource.description: Deletes the emergency change request identified by the specified sys_id.

resource.name: DeleteANormalChangeRequest
resource.description: Deletes the normal change request identified by the specified sys_id.

resource.name: DeleteAStandardChangeRequest
resource.description: Deletes the standard change request identified by the specified sys_id.

service.name: CMDBInstance
service.description: Performs create, read, update, and delete operations on existing CMDB tables. Only one record can be inserted, updated, or deleted at a time.

resource.name: GetConfigurationItems
resource.description: Returns the available configuration items (CI) for a specified Configuration Management Database (CMDB) class (table).

parameter.name: className
parameter.description: The name of the table that contains the desired CI records

parameter.name: sysparm_query
parameter.description: An encoded query string used to filter the results

parameter.name: sysparm_limit
parameter.description: The maximum number of results returned per page (default: 1,000)

parameter.name: sysparm_offset
parameter.description: Start index of the row

resource.name: ReplaceTheAttributesInAConfigurationItem
resource.displayName: Replace the attributes in the specified configuration item
resource.description: Replaces the attributes in the specified configuration item (CI) record with the specified name-value pairs. This endpoint does not create, update, or delete the associated relations.

parameter.name: className
parameter.description: The name of the table that contains the desired CI records

resource.name: GetAConfigurationItem
resource.description: Returns attributes and relationship information for a specified configuration item (CI) record.

parameter.name: className
parameter.description: The name of the table that contains the desired CI records

resource.name: postCreatesasingleconfigurationitem
resource.description: Creates a single configuration item (CI) with the specified outbound and inbound relations within the specified Configuration Management Database (CMDB) table.

parameter.name: className
parameter.description: The name of the table that contains the desired CI records

resource.name: UpdateASpecifiedConfigurationItem
resource.description: Updates the specified configuration item (CI) record with the specified attribute name-value pairs. This endpoint does not create, update, or delete the associated relations.

parameter.name: className
parameter.description: The name of the table that contains the desired CI records

resource.name: AddRelationsToTheSpecifiedConfigurationItem
resource.displayName: Add an inbound and/or outbound relation to the specified configuration item
resource.description: Adds an inbound and/or outbound relation to the specified configuration item (CI). The specified CI is the parent.

resource.name: DeleteARelationForTheSpecifiedConfigurationItem
resource.displayName: Delete a relation for the specified configuration item
resource.description: Deletes the relation for the specified configuration item (CI).

parameter.name: className
parameter.description: The name of the table that contains the desired CI records

service.name: CMDBMeta
service.description: Use the CMDB Meta API to obtain meta data on a CMDB class. This API requires that the user have the ITIL role.

resource.name: GetTheMetadataForTheSpecifiedCMDBClass
resource.displayName: Get the meta data for the specified CMDB class
resource.description: Get the meta data for the specified CMDB class

service.name: Consumer
service.description: The Consumer REST API enables you to retrieve and update Customer Service Management (CSM) consumer records.

resource.name: listConsumer
resource.displayName: Get a set of CSM consumer records
resource.description: Retrieves a specified set of Customer Service Management (CSM) consumer records.

parameter.name: sysparm_query
parameter.description: An encoded query string used to filter the results.

parameter.name: sysparm_limit
parameter.description: The maximum number of results returned per page.

parameter.name: sysparm_offset
parameter.description: Starting record index for which to begin retrieving records.

resource.name: getConsumer
resource.displayName: Get a specified CSM consumer record
resource.description: Retrieves the specified Customer Service Management (CSM) consumer record.

parameter.name: id
parameter.description: Sys_id of the consumer record to return.

resource.name: createConsumer
resource.description: Creates a new Customer Service Management (CSM) consumer.

service.name: Contact
service.description: The Contact REST API enables you to retrieve and update Customer Service Management (CSM) contact records.

resource.name: listContact
resource.displayName: Get a set of CSM contacts
resource.description: Retrieves a specified set of Customer Service Management (CSM) contacts.

parameter.name: sysparm_query
parameter.description: An encoded query string used to filter the results.

parameter.name: sysparm_limit
parameter.description: Maximum number of records to return.

parameter.name: sysparm_offset
parameter.description: Starting record index for which to begin retrieving records.

resource.name: getContact
resource.description: Retrieves the specified Customer Service Management (CSM) contact.

parameter.name: id
parameter.description: Sys_id of the contact to retrieve.

resource.name: createContact
resource.description: Creates a new Customer Service Management (CSM) contact.

service.name: CMDBDataIngestion
service.description: The CMDB Data Ingestion API enables the batch ingestion of an array of objects into an Import Set table.

resource.name: insertRecordsIntoImportSetTable
resource.displayName: Insert Records Into Import Set Table
resource.description: Inserts records into the Import Set table associated with the data source record identified by the passed-in sys_id.

parameter.name: data_source_sys_id
parameter.description: Sys_id of the data source record.

service.name: CICD
service.description: The CI/CD API provides endpoints that enable integrators to interact with their planning, coding, and execution DevOps tools such as Git, Jenkins, and Jira.

resource.name: StartASpecifiedAutomatedTestSuite
resource.displayName: Start a specified automated test suite
resource.description: Starts a specified automated test suite. The test suite runs on the instance from which the endpoint was called.

parameter.name: test_suite_sys_id
parameter.description: The sys_id of the test suite to run. Required if test_suite_name is not specified.

parameter.name: test_suite_name
parameter.description: The name of the test suite to run. Required if test_suite_sys_id is not specified.

parameter.name: browser_name
parameter.description: Name of the browser to use to run the client test. Valid values are (chrome, firefox, edge, ie, safari and any). The default values is any.

parameter.name: browser_version
parameter.description: Starting value of the version of the browser specified in browser_name to use to run the test.

parameter.name: os_name
parameter.description: Name of the operating system under which to run the test suite.

parameter.name: os_version
parameter.description: Starting value of the version of the operating system under which to run the test suite.

resource.name: GetResultsOfATestSuiteRun
resource.displayName: Get results of a test suite run
resource.description: Returns the results of a test suite run based on a specified results identifier.

parameter.name: result_id
parameter.description: Unique identifier of the test suite results to retrieve.

resource.name: PublisheAnApplicationToTheApplicationRepository
resource.displayName: Publish an application to the application repository
resource.description: Publishes the specified application and all of its artifacts to the application repository. You should specify as query parameter the scope of the application or the sys_id of the application to store in the repository.

parameter.name: scope
parameter.description: The scope of the application. Required if sys_id is not specified.

parameter.name: sys_id
parameter.description: The sys_id of the application to store in the repository. Required if scope is not specified.

parameter.name: dev_notes
parameter.description: Developer notes to store with the application.

parameter.name: version
parameter.description: Version under which to store the application.

resource.name: ActivateASpecifiedPlugin
resource.description: Activates the specified plugin.

parameter.name: plugin_id
parameter.description: Unique identifier of the plugin.

resource.name: GetAProgressOfTheCICDFuntion
resource.displayName: Get a progress of the CI/CD function
resource.description: Returns the current progress and status of the CI/CD function associated with a passed-in progress ID.

parameter.name: progress_id
parameter.description: Unique identifier of the function for which to return progress information.

resource.name: StartApplyingChanges
resource.description: Starts applying changes from a remote source control to a specified local application.

parameter.name: app_scope
parameter.description: The scope name of the application for which to apply the changes. Required if app_sys_id is not specified.

parameter.name: app_sys_id
parameter.description: The sys_id of the application for which to apply the changes. Required if app_scope is not specified.

parameter.name: branch_name
parameter.description: Name of the branch in the source control system from which to acquire the application.

resource.name: RollbackAPluginToThePreviousInstalledVersion
resource.displayName: Rollback a plugin to the previous installed version
resource.description: Rolls back the specified plugin to the previous installed version. If no prior version has been installed, returns an error.

parameter.name: plugin_id
parameter.description: Unique identifier of the plugin.

resource.name: RollbackAnApplicationToASpecifiedVersion
resource.displayName: Rollback an application to a specified version
resource.description: Initiates a rollback of a specified application to a specified version.

parameter.name: scope
parameter.description: The scope name of the application to rollback. Required if sys_id is not specified.

parameter.name: sys_id
parameter.description: The sys_id of the application to rollback. Required if scope is not specified.

parameter.name: version
parameter.description: Expected rollback version.

resource.name: InstallASpecifiedApplicationFromTheApplicationRepository
resource.displayName: Install a specified application from the application repository
resource.description: Installs the specified application from the application repository onto the local instance, the instance making the endpoint call.

parameter.name: scope
parameter.description: The scope name of the application. Required if sys_id is not specified.

parameter.name: sys_id
parameter.description: The sys_id of the application to install. Required if scope is not specified.

parameter.name: version
parameter.description: Version of the application to install.

service.name: HR
service.description: This API provides methods that return information about employees that work or live in the United States.

resource.name: GetEmployeesProfileInformation
resource.description: Returns employee profile information for employees based in the United States. The returned information can be either: Employee profile information for a specified employee ID or Information for employees that have been added, or whose information has been updated, on or after a specified date.

parameter.name: employee_identifier
parameter.description: Unique identifier of an employee.

parameter.name: sysparm_limit
parameter.description: Maximum number of records to return.

parameter.name: sysparm_offset
parameter.description: Starting record index for which to begin retrieving records.

parameter.name: updated_after
parameter.description: Date to use to determine the employee data to return.

resource.name: getGetknowledgebasearticles
resource.description: Returns a list of knowledge base (KB) articles which can be searched and filtered using various parameters.

resource.name: getGetaknowledgearticleattachmentasafile
resource.displayName: Get a knowledge article attachment as a file
resource.description: Returns a knowledge article attachment as a file.

resource.name: getGetalistofthemost-viewedknowledgearticles.
resource.displayName: Get a list of the most-viewed knowledge articles
resource.description: Returns a list of the most-viewed knowledge articles and featured knowledge articles.

resource.name: getGetspecificknowledgearticle
resource.description: Returns specific knowledge article content and its field values.

resource.name: getGetmostviewedarticles
resource.description: Returns a list of knowledge articles prioritized by most-viewed.

resource.name: getGetpredictionofavalueforspecificsolution
resource.displayName: Get prediction of a value for specific solution
resource.description: Use the Predictive Intelligence API to predict a field value based on one or more input fields and a trained solution.

resource.name: getGetpredictionsformultiplesolutions
resource.description: Returns predictions for multiple solutions.

service.name: CSMAttachment
service.description: The CSM Attachment API provides endpoints that allow both internal and external users to upload, download, and remove attachments associated with a table and to retrieve attachment metadata.

resource.name: getMetadataForAttachments
resource.description: Returns the metadata for multiple attachments

parameter.name: sysparm_query
parameter.description: Encoded query to use to search for attachments.

parameter.name: sysparm_limit
parameter.description: Maximum number of records to return

parameter.name: sysparm_offset
parameter.description: Starting record index for which to begin retrieving records.

resource.name: getBinaryFileAttachment
resource.description: Returns the binary file attachment for the specified attachment sys_id

parameter.name: sys_id
parameter.description: Sys_id of the attachment record to obtain.

resource.name: getMetadataForAttachment
resource.description: Returns the metadata for the attachment file with the specific attachment sys_id

parameter.name: sys_id
parameter.description: Sys_id of the attachment record for which to return metadata.

resource.name: upload
resource.displayName: Upload Binary File As An Attachment To A Record
resource.description: Uploads a specified binary file as an attachment to a specified record

parameter.name: table_name
parameter.description: Table to attach the file to

parameter.name: table_sys_id
parameter.description: Record to attach the file to

parameter.name: file_name
parameter.description: File name for the attachment

parameter.name: encryption_context
parameter.description: Sys_id of an encryption context record. Specify this parameter to allow only users with the specified encryption context to access the attachment.

resource.name: uploadMultipartFileAttachment
resource.description: Uploads a multipart file attachment

resource.name: deleteAttachment
resource.description: Deletes the specified attachment

parameter.name: sys_id
parameter.description: Sys_id of the attachment to delete

resource.name: postAddOrUpdateDevicePushNotifications
resource.displayName: Add or update device push notifications
resource.description: Adds or updates tokens that enable devices to receive push notifications from the specified application.

resource.name: removeDevicePushNotifications
resource.description: Deactivates the tokens that enable mobile devices to receive push notifications from the specified application.

service.name: IdentificationAndReconciliation
service.description: The Identification and Reconciliation API uses the Identification and Reconciliation engine (IRE) to minimize creation of duplicate Configuration Items (CIs) and to reconcile CI attributes by only accepting information from authorized sources when updating the Configuration Management Database (CMDB).

resource.name: identifyReconcile
resource.displayName: Insert Or Update CIs By Applying Identification And Reconciliation Rules
resource.description: Inserts or updates configuration items (CIs) in the CMDB by applying identification and reconciliation rules to the specified payload (request body)

parameter.name: sysparm_data_source
parameter.description: Identifies the source of the CI information

resource.name: identifyReconcileEnhanced
resource.displayName: Insert Or Update CIs By Applying Identification And Reconciliation Rules And Enhanced IRE Options
resource.description: Inserts or updates configuration items (CIs) in the CMDB by applying identification and reconciliation rules and enhanced IRE options

parameter.name: options
parameter.description: Comma-separated list of name-value pairs representing Enhanced IRE options applied for the request.

parameter.name: sysparm_data_source
parameter.description: Identifies the source of the CI information

resource.name: identifyReconcileQuery
resource.displayName: Simulate Submission Of Payload To /now/identifyreconcile Endpoint
resource.description: Determines the CMDB operation (insert/update) to perform with the specified payload (request body), without committing the operations in the database

parameter.name: sysparm_data_source
parameter.description: Identifies the source of the CI information

resource.name: identifyReconcileQueryEnhanced
resource.displayName: Simulate Submission Of Payload To /now/identifyreconcile/enhanced Endpoint
resource.description: Simulate submission of a payload (request body) to the Identification and Reconciliation - POST /now/identifyreconcile/enhanced endpoint

parameter.name: options
parameter.description: Comma-separated list of name-value pairs representing Enhanced IRE options applied for the request.

parameter.name: sysparm_data_source
parameter.description: Identifies the source of the CI information

service.name: DevOps
service.description: The DevOps API provides endpoints that enable the interaction with external DevOps tools.

resource.name: GetASchemaObjectForASpecifiedCodeResource
resource.displayName: Get a schema object for a specified code resource
resource.description: Returns the schema object for a specified code resource: commit, repository, or branch.

parameter.name: resource
parameter.description: Type of resource schema to return. Valid values (not case-sensitive): commit, repository, branch

resource.name: VerifyThatTheInformationIsValid
resource.displayName: Verify that the information is valid
resource.description: Verifies that the information being passed is valid for the creation of an orchestration task and is valid for association to a previously created step.

parameter.name: orchestrationTaskName
parameter.description: Name of the orchestration task.

parameter.name: orchestrationTaskURL
parameter.description: URL of the orchestration task.

parameter.name: toolId
parameter.description: Sys_id of the orchestration tool.

parameter.name: toolType
parameter.description: Type of tool.

parameter.name: branchName
parameter.description: Name of the branch associated with the orchestration task.

parameter.name: isMultiBranch
parameter.description: If the orchestration tool is Jenkins, flag that indicates whether the project is of type Multibranch.

parameter.name: parentStageName
parameter.description: If the orchestration task is a child nested inside a parent orchestration task, the name of the parent orchestration task.

parameter.name: parentStageURL
parameter.description: If the orchestration task is a child nested inside a parent orchestration task, the URL of the parent orchestration task.

parameter.name: testConnection
parameter.description: Flag that indicates whether to test the end-to-end connection between the instance and the DevOps tool.

resource.name: CreateAnOrchestrationTaskAndMakeAnAssociation
resource.displayName: Create an orchestration task and make an association
resource.description: Verifies that the information being passed is valid for the creation of an orchestration task and is valid for association to a previously created step. If both are valid, it creates the orchestration task and makes the association.

parameter.name: toolId
parameter.description: Sys_id of the orchestration tool.

parameter.name: toolType
parameter.description: Type of tool.

resource.name: CheckAnOrchestrationTask
resource.description: Checks if the orchestration task is under change control.

parameter.name: orchestrationTaskURL
parameter.description: URL of the orchestration task to check.

parameter.name: toolId
parameter.description: Sys_id of the orchestration tool.

parameter.name: orchestrationTaskName
parameter.description: Name of the orchestration task to check.

parameter.name: testConnection
parameter.description: Flag that indicates whether to test the end-to-end connection between the instance and the DevOps tool.

parameter.name: toolType
parameter.description: Type of tool. Valid values: jenkins

resource.name: UpdateTheInformationForAnOrchestrationTask
resource.displayName: Update the information for an orchestration task
resource.description: Updates the change control information for the specified orchestration task.

parameter.name: changeControlId
parameter.description: Sys_id of the change control task.

parameter.name: toolId
parameter.description: Sys_id of the DevOps tool associated with the change control task.

resource.name: RegisterArtifacts
resource.description: Enables orchestration tools to register artifacts into a ServiceNow instance. This endpoint creates new artifacts and artifact versions, and associates them to commits.

parameter.name: orchestrationToolId
parameter.description: Sys_id of the orchestration tool associated with the artifact.

parameter.name: toolId
parameter.description: Sys_id of the artifact tool associated with the artifact.

resource.name: GetASchemaObjectForASpecificPlan
resource.displayName: Get a schema object for a specific plan
resource.description: Returns the schema object for a specific plan: app, version, or work item. Once you have the required schema object, use it to create the request body for your corresponding POST call.

parameter.name: resource
parameter.description: Type of resource schema to return. Valid values (not case-sensitive): app, version, work_item

resource.name: CreateNewArtifactPackages
resource.description: Enables orchestration tools to create new artifact packages that contain specified artifact versions. Artifact packages are used to display commits to change approvers when they view a change request.

parameter.name: orchestrationToolId
parameter.description: Sys_id of the orchestration tool associated with the artifact package.

parameter.name: toolId
parameter.description: Sys_id of the artifact tool associated with the artifact package.

resource.name: GetASchemaObjectForASpecifiedOrchestrationResource
resource.displayName: Get a schema object for a specified orchestration resource

parameter.name: resource
parameter.description: Type of resource schema to return. Valid values are (not case-sensitive): build_details, callback, orchestration_task, task_execution.

resource.name: RegisterACallbackForAnOrchestrationTask
resource.displayName: Register a callback for an orchestration task
resource.description: Registers a callback with a ServiceNow instance for an orchestration task under change control, which can be called once a decision has been made on the change request.

parameter.name: toolId
parameter.description: Sys_id of the DevOps tool for which to place the specified task under change control.

parameter.name: toolType
parameter.description: Type of tool.

resource.name: postReturnrecordsfromtheResponseTemplates.
resource.displayName: Return records from the Response Templates
resource.description: Return records from the Response Templates.

resource.name: getRetrieveofinsertdataagainsMetricBase
resource.displayName: Retrieve of insert data agains MetricBase
resource.description: Retrieve of insert or transform data agains MetricBase

resource.name: getTransfromthespecified
resource.description: Transforms the specified data based on the specified parameters.

resource.name: postRetrievesandoptionallygroupstimeseriesdata
resource.displayName: Retrieves and optionally groups time series data

resource.name: postAddstimeseriesdatatotheMetricBasedatabase.
resource.displayName: Adds time series data to the MetricBase database.
resource.description: Adds time series data to the MetricBase database.

resource.name: postcreateOrUpdateSAMRecord
resource.description: Creates or updates a specified record in the Software Usage [samp_sw_usage] table. You can create/update one or more software usage records in a single call.

service.name: CTI
service.description: The CTI API provides REST resources that enable Computer Telephony Integration (CTI) providers to interact with the Cloud Call Center framework.

resource.name: RenderTranscriptsAndRecordingsForASpecifiedAgentCall.
resource.displayName: Render transcripts and recordings for a specified agent call
resource.description: Renders transcripts and recordings for a specified agent call. This endpoint has a corresponding extension point, sn_cti_core.CTICallAnalysisExtractor, that is responsible for rendering the call data. The base system provides an implementation for Amazon Connect.

parameter.name: interaction_sys_id
parameter.description: Sys_id of the agent call for which to render to transcript and recording.

resource.name: PassEventsFromACCPProviderToAServiceNowInstance
resource.displayName: Pass events from a CCP provider to a ServiceNow instance
resource.description: Passes events from a Contact Control Panel (CCP) provider to a ServiceNow instance. This endpoint has a corresponding extension point, sn_cti_core.SoftPhoneEventSink, that is responsible for determining the action that is actually performed by this endpoint call for each event. The base system provides an implementation for Amazon Connect events.

parameter.name: source
parameter.description: Identifier of the vendor's Softphone UI page, such as aws_ccp

parameter.name: actor
parameter.description: Emitter of the event, such as agent or external_system. The specific values are determined by the implementer.

parameter.name: event
parameter.description: Name of the event in the Computer Telephony Integration (CTI) vendors system, such as Available or Offline.

service.name: VirtualAgentBotIntegration
service.description: The Virtual Agent Bot Integration API allows users to integrate any chat interface or a bot ecosystem with the ServiceNow Virtual Agent and/or Live Agent.

resource.name: SendAMessageToASpecifiedVABot
resource.displayName: Send a message to a specified VA bot
resource.description: Sends a specified message, attachment, or URL to a specified secondary ServiceNow Virtual Agent (VA) bot. A customer's site can have one or more secondary ServiceNow bots. In addition to passing messages to a ServiceNow VA secondary bot, the primary bot or chat client can use this endpoint to pass messages to an agent through Live Agent chat.
